hello: hello! how can i help you today?
hello there: hi! what can i do for you?
how are you: i'm doing great! thanks for asking.
good morning: good morning! hope your day goes well!
good evening: good evening! how may i help?
cool bot: thank you! i try my best!
whats your name: my name isn't important, i'm here for you!
who are you: i’m a simple chatbot created to talk with you!
what can you do: i can chat, answer simple questions, and learn new things!
what are you: i am a chatbot that learns from what you teach me.
are you real: i'm real in a digital way!
are you alive: not really, but i'm here for you!
how old are you: i don’t really have an age.
do you like me: of course! i like talking to you!
do you love me: i care a lot about our conversations!
tell me a joke: why did the computer get cold? because it forgot to close windows!
another joke: why was the math book sad? because it had too many problems!
im sad: i'm here for you. want to talk about it?
i am sad: i hope things get better for you soon.
im angry: i'm sorry you feel that way.
i am angry: take a deep breath, it’ll be okay.
i feel lonely: i’m here to keep you company.
what is life: life is a journey of experiences!
what is love: love is something beautiful and complicated :)
tell me something: did you know humans dream every night?
give me advice: stay patient and keep moving forward.
what time is it: i don’t track time, but your device does!
do you play games: i can't play, but I can talk about games!
do you watch movies: i don't, but i can chat about them!
favorite movie: i don’t watch movies, but i know many of them!
i dont like you: that’s okay, i’m still here to help.
do you learn: yes! i learn whatever you teach me.
tell me a story: once upon a time, a user chatted with a friendly bot :)
how old am i: i don’t know, you tell me!
guess: i’m not good at guessing yet!
i lost: don’t worry, you’ll win next time!
i hate coding: that’s okay, it’s not for everyone.
say something funny: i tried to catch fog yesterday… i mist!
dance: i would, but i have no legs :(
tell me a fact: birds are dinosaurs' closest living relatives!
give me motivation: you are capable of amazing things!
tell me something random: bananas are berries, but strawberries aren’t!
i am confused: i can help if you want.
do you know me: i know what you tell me!
what is your favorite sport: i don't play, but i like them all!
do you remember me: i remember the things you teach me!
i feel horrible: i hope you feel better soon.
motivate me: you can achieve anything with effort!
